Oscar Espitia

Oscar met Ashmi at the age of 19, he fell in love with her from the moment they started their friendship. He loves the way she smiles at him and laughs with him. Oscar is excited to start new adventures as a family, creating lasting memories together.

Ashmi Sundaralingam

Ashmi met the love of her life at the age of 21, she instantly fell in love with his sweet and kind soul. She can be her authentic self with him, without any fear of judgment. Ashmi is looking forward to growing old with Oscar and has committed herself to continue annoying him for many years to come!
